caseSummary: Customer reported unauthorized charges totaling $217.49 from unknown merchants. Immediate card block and fraud dispute initiated with provisional credit within 24 hours. New expedited card issued.
Customer requested credit limit increase from $3,500. With improved income and excellent payment history, approved for increase to $6,500. Premium tier upgrade information provided.

Elite member experiencing mobile app payment failures for 2 days. Urgent payment of $2,847.50 processed via phone. App bug affecting iOS Elite users identified, fix pending 5-7 days. $25 credit applied.
Customer concerned about PIN security after someone stood too close at ATM. Proactive PIN reset completed over phone with security guidelines provided. Account activity verified as normal.
